title: How do I forward a text message and send a text message to multiple recipients?
answer:
To forward a message, touch the message in a conversation and choose Forward from the shortcut menu, and then specify a contact. 

 To send a message to multiple recipients, write a message, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110528) and select multiple contacts, touch SELECT.
